references.paper_title: Coupled oscillatory recurrent neural network (cornn): An accurate and (gradient) stable architecture for learning long time dependencies
references.reason: This paper introduces Coupled Oscillatory Recurrent Neural Networks (coRNNs), a baseline method for learning latent dynamics and a network architecture similar to the CON proposed in this paper.

references.paper_title: Controlled lagrangians and the stabilization of mechanical systems. ii. potential shaping
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of potential shaping, which is leveraged in this work for model-based control in latent space.
